items.meta_description: Book an appointment at Sports Orthopedics, one of Bangalore’s top clinics, founded by gold medalist Dr. Naveen. Trusted care for all orthopedic needs
items.title: Book an Appointment

items.content_html:
Booking ID:

Your Appointment Booked successfully!

We have sent your booking information to your email address.
